entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:45 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 06:26 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain this morning. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
